content: this listing is for my squirrel amigurumi pattern this squirrel crochet pattern includes written and detailed photo instructions for a tray and red squirrel and acorns i have a free written pattern and video tutorial for the squirrel on my website 1 this pdf pattern is simply for those of you who prefer a pdf version of the pattern that can be accessed offline or printed **content ** the squirrel amigurumi pattern has detailed step-by-step instructions that are accompanied by many photos of the process photo tutorials on how to make a magic_ring invisible decreases in single_crochet color changes in single_crochet and closing small rounds are included too **language ** english us only **materials and tools ** - - dk/light worsted yarn in gray beige and white for the gray squirrel rusty red and white for the red squirrel and brown and ochre for the acorns i used rico creative ricorumi dk in mouse grey 059 beige 055 cream 002 and fox 025 and scheepjes catona in black coffee 162 and ginger gold 383 - 2 5mm crochet hook / size b-1 or c-2 depending on how tightly you crochet - black embroidery floss - fiberfill - stitch marker - yarn needle preferably with bent tip - large-eyed sewing needle - sewing pins - scissors **size ** the squirrels will be about 6 cm/2 5 and the acorns 2 5cm/1 short if using the recommended hook size and yarn weight if you would like them to be larger or smaller you can use a different yarn weight and adjust the hook size accordingly **construction ** the body is crocheted from bottom to top the little arms are crocheted on the ears head and tail are sewn on for the eyes i used safety eyes and the nose and mouth are embroidered thank you for stopping by happy creating 1 https //stellasyarnuniverse com/amigurumi-squirrel-free-crochet-pattern/
